page.title: 13Favourite Foods
page.content: Our class's favourite meal is fish (or fish fingers) and chips. Other popular foods are eggs, chicken or turkey, sausages, baked beans, burgers, tomato soup, beef, sweets, cakes and jam. One child likes eating rice paper. The favourite drink is cola. Other popular drinks are tea, coffee, orange squash, lemonade and Lucozade. In our school canteen the usual 1st courses are minced meat, sausages, luncheon meat, hard-boiled eggs, cheese and salad, meat pie or burgers or hot dogs. The usual vegetables are peas, beans (baked or green), cabbage or carrots, and the potatoes are boiled, mashed, chipped, roast or baked in their jackets. The choice of 2nd course usually includes cakes, biscuits, doughnuts, yoghurt, jelly, ice cream or fresh fruit. Drinks available are orange or lemon squash, milk or water.
